quote: I ordered a hot chocolate and Chandler got a black coffee. He smiled over at me. ""Still no love for coffee?""I shook my head. ""Nah, why have bitter and gross when I can have sweet and delicious?
quote_letters: I ORDERED A HOT CHOCOLATE AND CHANDLER GOT A BLACK COFFEE HE SMILED OVER AT ME STILL NO LOVE FOR COFFEEI SHOOK MY HEAD NAH WHY HAVE BITTER AND GROSS WHEN I CAN HAVE SWEET AND DELICIOUS
